objects.specification: A large rectangular floor plane with a warm light wood texture showcasing realistic wood grain patterns, a subtle sheen finish, and soft bevels on the edges to simulate a polished wooden classroom floor.
A rectangular ceiling panel painted in a soft cream tone with a smooth finish and crisp right‐angle edges to simulate a modern indoor classroom ceiling.
A long classroom wall with a smooth plaster surface painted in soft cream, featuring crisp edges and a slight bevel to emulate a finished interior wall.
A long classroom wall with a smooth plaster surface painted in soft cream, featuring crisp edges and a slight bevel to emulate a finished interior wall.
A short classroom wall with a smooth plaster surface painted in soft cream, featuring crisp edges and a slight bevel to emulate a finished interior wall.
A short classroom wall with a smooth plaster surface painted in soft cream, featuring crisp edges and a slight bevel to emulate a finished interior wall.

A large rectangular teachers desk in a light wood finish with a smooth surface showing subtle grain, supported by four sturdy squared legs and featuring a modesty panel beneath the top for a professional classroom appearance.

A comfortable teachers chair with a light wood frame and matching light wood legs, featuring a cushioned seat and backrest in a complementary color, mounted on a five‐caster swivel base for ease of movement.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a smooth white glossy writing surface, framed by a thin aluminum border, with visible mounting points for wall attachment.
A ceiling-mounted projector with a compact white housing, featuring a central lens, side vents, and a simple mounting bracket to suspend it just below the ceiling.
A student desk made of light wood with a smooth rectangular top, subtle visible grain texture, four straight legs, and a modesty panel beneath for a classic school desk design.
A student chair with a light wood frame, gently curved backrest, four straight legs, and a padded seat cushion in a complementary color to the wood finish.
A rectangular window opening with a thin frame and a clear glass pane, set flush into the wall to admit natural daylight.
A pleated fabric curtain panel in a complementary soft color, with visible folds and a subtle cloth texture, sized to cover the window opening.
A tall light wood bookshelf with five evenly spaced shelves fully stocked with books of varied heights and colorful spines, featuring subtle wood grain texture and clean edges.
A circular analog wall clock with a white face, black hour numerals, slim black hour and minute hands, and a narrow frame in dark neutral color.
A potted plant with lush green foliage and multiple leaf clusters, planted in a simple neutral ceramic pot with a slight glossy finish.
A recessed circular ceiling light fixture with a smooth white trim and a warm light diffuser, designed for even illumination.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring colorful diagrams and text, mounted in a thin frame for wall display.
A small open-top cylindrical waste bin made of gray plastic with a smooth exterior surface.
